location.description: The location or address of the company.

twitter.description: The URL to the twitter profile associated with the company.

linkedin.description: The URL to the LinkedIn profile associated with the company.

facebook.description: The URL to the Facebook page associated with the company.

logo.description: URL to the logo or image for the company.

founded.description: The year the company was founded.

employees.description: An approximate number of employees with the company.

category.description: The category of the company. Possible values are Adult, Email Provider, Education, SMS, or Other.

details.description: When included, additional details about the company provided through Data Add-ons will be available here.
